title: march 12: the smallest dinosaur (with Vérité)
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about what might be the smallest dinosaur fossil on record. After, she’s joined by special guest Verite. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
